name: M.A.S.H. Party
description: The classic game of M.A.S.H. comes to your pocket and is bigger and better than ever! Create and share epic and amazing M.A.S.H. stories that will provide hours of laughter and entertainment. Find out where you are going to live and work, and who you will marry! MASH stands for Mansion, Apartment, Shack, House, and is a classic school pen and paper game, now brought to you in epic digital form. Will the fun ever stop? Probably not, but there is only one way to find out - play MASH Party today! No pencil and paper required, batteries not included.
